title: MoviePass subscribers in the U.S. 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of subscribers in thousands for 7 number of Months.
Month June 2018 has the highest Number of subscribers in thousands and December 2016 has the lowest Number of subscribers in thousands.
There is a difference of 2980.0 between the maximum Month June 2018 and minimum Month December 2016.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of subscribers in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month December 2016.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of subscribers in thousands for 7 number of Months.
Month June 2018 has the highest Number of subscribers in thousands and December 2016 has the lowest Number of subscribers in thousands.
There is a difference of 2980.0 between the maximum Month June 2018 and minimum Month December 2016.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of subscribers in thousands in the y axis.
Month June 2018 has the highest Number of subscribers in thousands and December 2016 has the lowest Number of subscribers in thousands.
The difference of Number of subscribers in thousands between the highest and lowest Month is 2980.0.
The Month June 2018 has the highest Number of subscribers in thousands, followed by March 2018, and January 2018. Down to the Month December 2016 which is the lowest.
Over the past 7 Months, the Number of subscribers in thousands has reduced.
The Month June 2018 tends to be 2.84 percent higher than average.
